name: Circle Wizard
description:
THIS GAME IS STILL EARLY IN DEVELOPMENT!

Controls:

A to rotate counter-clockwise

D to rotate clockwise

This is a small game created for the 2 button game jam. Randomly cycle between three unique spells while fending off progressively harder waves of enemies.

In future patches I plan on updating the graphics, as well as adding more enemies, spells and variety between playthroughs

Thank you for checking out one of my first games and please enjoy!
